title: Lady Gaga and a fan tumble off the stage during Las Vegas concert
text:
Lady Gaga gave her fans a scare on Thursday night when she fell off the stage at her Las Vegas concert.

The moment happened after she brought a fan, Jack, onto the stage. He slipped when she jumped into his arms, taking them both down.

Clips of the pair tumbling off the stage were widely shared across social media, with many expressing their concern on social platforms.

Lady Gaga tells a fan not to blame himself after she falls off stage in his arms during Vegas show. https://t.co/EjI3raOBm0 — Twitter Moments (@TwitterMoments) October 18, 2019

However, in typical Gaga fashion, she quickly recovered and carried on with her show like a pro.

"Everything's OK," she told the crowd. "The only thing that's not OK is we need some stairs for the damn stage so I can get back up."

The singer can also be heard asking Jack if he is okay in a video taken at the show. "You alright?" she says. "Everything’s fine! It’s not your fault...let’s go, come on. Are you ok?”

The pair then shared a moment on stage in which she made Jack make a promise to her.

"Can you just forgive yourself right now for that happening?" she asked him, before saying that she has fallen off of stages before and joking about the incident.

Gaga later shared a photo of herself taking an ice bath following the concert.
description: Lady Gaga gave her fans a scare on Thursday night when she fell off the stage at her Las Vegas concert.
